name: MaterialHardshipScreeningAssessmentsQuestions
title: Material Hardship Screening Assessments Questions
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents screening assessment questions for Material Hardship as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: This set of values may be used to represent screening assessment questions in observations, questionnaires, and questionnaire responses for this SDOH domain (e.g., for the SDOHCC Observation Screening Response profile in the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for SDOH screening assessment questions as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes the questions not selected by the Gravity Project from SDOH screening assessments.)

concept.display: You don't have enough money to buy the things you or your kids need [PhenX]
Have you or any family members you live with been unable to get any of the following when it was really needed in past 1 year [PRAPARE]
Do you have trouble paying for your gas or electricity bills [WellRx]
Has the electric, gas, oil, or water company threatened to shut off services in your home in past 12 months
Problems getting child care make work or study difficult
Could not see doctor due to cost in past 12Mo
How often does this describe you, I don't have enough money to pay my bills
